translation.Name: Rio Note - Jungle Defenders #2
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_0: The grass has been losing color recently and people won't stop getting sick, first no seeds would grow, and now we haven't even see any animals around since they're all dying for some reason! Nobody knows the cause of this, is the meat infected or something? Everyone started to show signs of sickness after we started eating the meat. If the meat's the cause of sickness, then we're gonna burn it and find something else to eat.
